title: Verify Earnest Money Deposit
description: The TC must confirm that the buyer has deposited the earnest money with escrow by the contractual deadline.

tasks.description: Check the transaction timeline for the earnest money deposit deadline.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies that the deadline is within 3 days of acceptance.

tasks.description: Contact the escrow officer to confirm receipt of the deposit.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent communicates with the escrow officer who confirms the funds have been received.

tasks.description: Upload the receipt of deposit to the transaction file and mark the contingency as complete.
tasks.expected_outcome: The TC uploads the receipt document and updates the checklist in the transaction system.
